Name: CHOOSE_COURSE
Value: To get a course channel added or removed, click on the associated button below this message. Green button adds the course channel. Red button removes the course channel.

Name: CHOOSE_DEPARTMENT_Join
Value: Choose a department that the course you are looking for is under.

Name: CHOOSE_SEMESTER_Join
Value: Choose a semester to join enrolled courses from.

Name: CHOOSE_SEMESTER_Leave
Value: Choose a semester to leave enrolled courses from.

Name: CHOOSE_SEMESTER_Toggle
Value: Choose a semester to toggle enrolled courses from.

Name: COURSES_MISSING
Value: These courses were found for the given criteria, but are not on the server: {0}. If you want these to be added, contact administrators.

Name: COURSES_NOT_FOUND
Value: Could not find any course for the given criteria.

Name: COURSES_SUCCESSFULLY_ASSIGNED
Value: Successfully assigned you to these courses

Name: COURSES_SUCCESSFULLY_DEASSIGNED
Value: Successfully deassigned you from these courses

Name: COURSE_BY_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND
Value: Could not find any course for the given channel.

Name: COURSE_BY_SEMESTER_CHOOSE
Value: Found these enrolled courses in the chosen semester.

Name: COURSE_BY_SEMESTER_NOT_FOUND
Value: You do not have any enrolled courses in the chosen semester.

Name: DEPARTMENTS_COURSES
Value: Found these courses for the chosen department.

Name: NOT_AUTHENTICATED
Value: You are not authenticated. This feature can be used only by authenticated users.

Name: SEARCH_COURSE_SUCCESS
Value: Found these courses in the given criteria.

Name: MAIN_MESSAGE_CONTENT
Value:
:information_source: (BETA) **Interactive course channels assignment**
English version is currently only partially supported. Courses and departments will be in the Czech language. If you are unsure how to find course you are looking for, contact others in <#1020326829623607356>.

Hello, here you can interactively choose what course channels you want to see here. What buttons do should be obvious from the labels, but below you can find the full instructions. This is currently a beta, if you find an error, report it to <#753695738671792211>.

Buttons **join/leave course by code** will open a modal with a text input. You can put **whole codes** of courses into the input separated by space. When you confirm the modal, the bot will assign you to/remove you from these courses. If you know only a part of a code or a name, try the button search courses.

Buttons **join/leave course by semester** will send you a message to select a semester (previous, current, next). After you choose a semester, the bot will add/remove the courses you are enrolled in for the given semester.

Button **search courses** will open a modal with a text input. You can put parts of codes or parts of names (_some may work in english_) to search for.

Button **search courses by semester** will send you a message to select a semester. After you select a semester, the bot will send you a message to choose what courses you want to add or remove.

The messages sent by the bot can be removed by clicking on _Dismiss message_ below the message. They won't be removed automatically.
Good luck!
